answers.answer: If you are diabetic it might cause this and/or something to do with the kidney function. Especially if you are drinking more water or fluids. Diabetes usually makes people thirsty. Have they checked you for diabetes?

question: Hello,Few weeks ago I suddenly started to have sometimes massive urination.I mean that in 1 urination I have a lot of urine, regardless of the amount of my drinking.I noticed this happens only when:1) I take vitamin Dor2)I eat large Carbohydrate mealsI did blood tests and I have low vitamin D and high glucose.My doctor don't know why it is happening.What could be the reason?Thank you.
title: Massive urination
